channel.title: Adding Thieving Stalls And Setting the Ammount!
channel.description:
How do I add a theiving stall to edgeville bank and set the ammount you can theive?
someone post a code ?
or explain and go into great detail I have no clue about coding tbh

item.title: Adding Thieving Stalls And Setting the Ammount!
item.dc:creator: @Never_Again Never Again
item.description:
@Never_Again wrote:

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(emote); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM(message); addItem(item, itemAmount); addSkillXP(XPamount, 17); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); } }

thats what I have I want a stall at edge that you can theive 500k and only have to be level 1 and where in that mess will it go? exactly

Read full topic
